name: dynamic-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.
